glosses: A suffix with infinite productivity that forms verbs from other verbs, adding the meaning of "to do the same action with ease, quickly".

examples.text: koşmak (“to run”) + -uvermek → koşuvermek (“to run real quick”)

examples.translation: Go to the bakery real quick, come on.

examples.text: Gece yarıları, dem şişesi koltuğunun altında kayboluvermeler.
